item.title: Social Networks & Social Gaming used most for Mobile Broadband
item.description: This news from Hutchison 3G UK shows that using social media is more important on their mobile network is interesting …. Keeping up to date with friends or regular gameplay on the move is now more important than checking emails or reading the news. In my opinion, Social Networking continues to dominate growth in internet usage - however, you shouldn’t assume that its all fun on the go. Social Media sites like Twitter, Facebook and LinkedInare all used for b2b leads and d2c customer service.

item.title: 3 rewards customers who get customers
item.description: From today 3 UK will reward customers with cashback for referrals. Join 3’s Free Agent team and get paid for promoting our free SIMs online. You get £5 cash when each friend first tops up their SIM by a minimum of £10, and they get an extra £2 credit. There’s no limit to the amount of money you can make. see also: http://freeagent.three.co.uk/
